cellengine 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Articles

    CellEngine R API Toolkit

    Installing:

    library("devtools")
install_github("primitybio/cellengine-r-toolkit")

    Quick start:

    library("cellengine")
authenticate("username", Sys.getenv("CELLENGINE_PASSWORD"))

experiments = getExperiments()
